content:
I am a first-year master’s student in the program Systems, Controls, and Mechatronics at the Chalmers University of Technology, Gothenburg, Sweden. I am also a part of the Chalmers Formula Student Driverless team, is a student-driven project team building a high-performance autonomous racecar. I am responsible for Vision, Localization, and Mapping. I am also responsible for Low-level Embedded Software.
Before Chalmers, I worked at Robert Bosch GmbH as a Senior Software Engineer, where I developed device drivers for safety-critical supply modules in all Bosch electrical braking system products. My research interests are Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Robotics, and Sensor Fusion.
